title: Correction: Asymmetrical Reinforcement and Wolbachia Infection in Drosophila
fullText:
In PLoS Biology, volume 4, issue 10: doi:10.1371/journal.pbio.0040325

The “female population” part of the x-axis label in Figure 2 has an error: the labels sym and allo are switched in two places. Attached is a PDF of Figure 2 as it should appear. The legend should remain the same.
